text: Kennedy Town Terminus () is a tram stop and one of the seven termini of Hong Kong Tramways, a double-decker tram system. Located in Kennedy Town, it is the system's westernmost terminus, and one of its three termini in the Central and Western District on Hong Kong Island. ==Routes== *Kennedy Town ↔ Happy Valley *Kennedy Town ↔ Shau Kei Wan ==References== Category:Hong Kong Tramways stops
title: Kennedy Town Terminus
